ComicInfo.Title: The One Who Was Dead; He Kidnaped [sic] a Rocket; The Hunter; Halfway Home!; Look Out for the Martians
ComicInfo.Summary:
The One Who Was Dead: A man uses life restore serum to revive Cleopatra, but it also works on the Asp that she used to commit suicide, and it bites him.
He Kidnaped [sic] a Rocket: A criminal hijacks a rocket, but unknown to him, its destination is a space prison colony.
The Hunter: A hunter winds up on a planet where animals are the masters and place humans in zoos.
Halfway Home!: A scientist aboard a rocket without enough fuel to reach Earth wants to use a device to reduce the weight of the crew by half. When he tests it on a monkey, it shrinks the monkey to half-size, but when he tries it out on himself it cuts him in half.
Look Out for the Martians: A man realizes that he is actually a Martian that has been incubated into a human infant and only becomes aware of his identity once maturity has been reached. Human agents called 'scanners' attempt to neutralize him, but fail.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Authorized A. C. M. P. Conforms to the Comics Code
ComicInfo.Characters: Queen Cleopatra VII Philopater of Egypt (69-30 BC)
ComicInfo.Penciller: Paul Reinman,Bill Benulis,Sid Greene,Chuck Winter,John Forte
ComicInfo.Inker: Paul Reinman,Jack Abel,Bob Stuart,Chuck Winter,John Forte
